title: I’m a Villainess, But I’m Happy Because I’m Healthy - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Fantasy   Romance   School Life   Shoujo   Slice of Life
tags: Age Progression   Beautiful Female Lead   Child Protagonist   Childhood Friends   Childhood Love   Cute Children   Doting Parents   Fat Protagonist   Fat to Fit   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Kingdoms   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Male Yandere   Monsters   Nobles   Otome Game   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Reincarnated in a Game World   Royalty   Slow Romance   Teachers   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Cecil-hee
description:
“I’m the villainess!!”

Aslan recalls memories of her previous life.

By the way, she was a villainess in the game.

But her biggest problem was.

“Mother! You said these were all baby fat!”

1:1 ratio of height and weight.

That was the biggest factor that frustrated her.

If you do this, you will die from obesity.

“Must be healthy and enjoy the heavenly waters!”

It was a moment when her fate changed.

“Health is the best!”>
